Params: {3: "No. 21's claws are like frenzied yet precise scalpels, tearing apart the storm and the enemies."}
{3: "In this weather, Noctis' cluster bombs are not as effective as they can be. The three of them only break through the enemies outside their hideout by coordinating with each other's strength."}
{3: 'Every time Noctis opens his mouth and speaks, sand pours inside his vocal module from the wind.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "The sandstorm is disrupting my sensors like a magnetic field. I can't sense Beardy anywhere.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Cough... Why can you two talk... Ptooey...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Vera smirks and points to her ear.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Hello? Hello! Is this working? Can you hear me?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "After seeing those enemies, I don't know if Beardy is still alive.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "A dead man should leave a corpse, right? I haven't seen his dead body yet.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera thinks for a second and answers.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "We'll split up. It's a rocky coast in the northeast. It's too big.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Noctis, you take our 1 o'clock direction. No. 21 and I will look for him in our 2 o'clock direction.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Walk forward for 3 km. If you don't find him by then, walk back the way you came from.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "It's a miracle if a human can go further than 2 km in this storm.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "We're getting close to our deadline as well. We can't waste too much time here.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Noctis nods and heads into the dark yellow sandstorm.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'I should be able to locate Beardy once the storm dies down.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Dead or alive, we'll have to find him first.", 4: '1'}
